artist: Larsen Design Studio Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: See individual description below.  Early samples probably from school.  There were always sample warps on the Structos and other small looms in the studio.  Usually natural fibers, one or a mixture, and natural color.  None of these were in the line. Plain weave, white warp with greenish-yellow weft. (white, greenish-yellow)
title: Casement Samples
